## AuthoringElement interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AuthoringElement 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [allowMultipleValues](./api.authoringelement.allowmultiplevalues.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indicates whether content items using this content-type can contain multiple values of this element. Valid for all element types except category, toggle and location. |
|  [elementType](./api.authoringelement.elementtype.md) | <code>ELEMENT_TYPE &#124; 'productcategory' &#124; 'product'</code> | Specifies the type of this element. |
|  [fieldLabel](./api.authoringelement.fieldlabel.md) | <code>string</code> | When allowMultipleValues is true, specifies a display name for each value within the multi valued list. |
|  [helpText](./api.authoringelement.helptext.md) | <code>string</code> | The informational text to show the content author when setting the value of this element. |
|  [key](./api.authoringelement.key.md) | <code>string</code> | The element identifer. Within content items, elements are referred to by key only. |
|  [label](./api.authoringelement.label.md) | <code>string</code> | The display name of the element. |
|  [maximumValues](./api.authoringelement.maximumvalues.md) | <code>number</code> | When allowMulitpleValues is true, indicates the maximum number of values are that allowed. |
|  [minimumValues](./api.authoringelement.minimumvalues.md) | <code>number</code> | When allowMulitpleValues is true, indicates the minimum number of values are that required. |
|  [placeholder](./api.authoringelement.placeholder.md) | <code>AuthoringPlaceholder</code> |  |
|  [required](./api.authoringelement.required.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indicates whether content items must specify a value for this element. |
|  [role](./api.authoringelement.role.md) | <code>AUTHORING_ELEMENT_ROLE[]</code> |  |
|  [uiExtensions](./api.authoringelement.uiextensions.md) | <code>AuthoringUiExtensions</code> |  |
